item.title: The Society of the Spectacle
item.description: “The Society of the Spectacle” is a collection of aphorisms put together by Guy Debord; quite a few of them has stood the test of them, but one that caught my eye is on the apocalyptic vision of monotheistic religions. Transhumanism was to play the same role in the modern world, but it had died a horrible death. It is now rather clear I think that technologies that are to radically change the human condition (beyond methods of social engineering) lie beyond this century.
